replies.body:
People need to stop watching Siv HD and trying to copy him.

RoA is a great item, for champs who are late game and just want to survive and not fall behind in lane.

For a champ where your aim is to blow someone up, RoA is a waste of stats.
Who needs survivability when you can kill someone before they even see you.
Meh. You're better off going for straight damage than RoA. Sure, the stats are nice, but you're sacrificing your ability to blow someone up. It's not really worth the investment.
Agreed. Not bad, just not as good as other items.
